text: mahapoḷovē særisarā ovunaṭa pera siṭiyavungē avasānaya kesē vī dæyi ovuhu nobæluvehu da? ovuhu movunaṭa vaḍā śaktiyen adhika vūha. ovuhu mahapoḷovē asvæddūha. movun pālanaya kaḷa dǣṭa vaḍā ovuhu eya adhika lesa paripālanaya kaḷōya. ovun veta ovungē dūtavaru pæhædili sādhaka saman̆ga pæmiṇiyaha. ovunaṭa aparādha kirīmaṭa allāhṭa novīya. enamut ovuhu ovunaṭama aparādha karagannan vūha
